Document.name: InitWithGroup
Document.summary: Set data for sorting, by providing a list for objects, and a group for their relationship.
Document.typeparam: Type of the list for objects. , or are recommended.
Document.param: Relationship of objects for sorting in . Both keys and values are elements in "items". To say that a depends on b, do depGroup.Add(a, b).
Document.signature: template < typename TList > void InitWithGroup( TList const & items, GroupOf<TList> const & depGroup );
